div.p: This project allows to open and work with maven projects in upcoming Netbeans IDE 4.0. See the features list to learn more about Mevenide for Netbeans IDE.
It works with development builds of Netbeans 4.0, JDK 1.4.1 and Maven 1.0-rc2. To get the Netbeans builds, go to the download page Mevenide was tested with build 200405191800.

If you are using previous versions of Netbeans (3.5.1 and 3.6), please check the The snapshot release of Mevenide for Netbeans 3.x. It features basic integration within the 3.x framework. However it's not actively developed anymore. The upcoming 4.0 is where the development focus goes now.

There is another Netbeans module that adds code completion to Maven related xml files. It's complementary to this module but can be used separately, works also in Netbeans 3.6. For details, go to Mevenide Grammar module
